GetImportedAmazonOrder.Statement: SELECT w2_Order.*, w2_OrderItem.*, w2_OrderOwner.*, w2_OrderShipping.* FROM w2_Order INNER JOIN w2_OrderItem ON ( w2_OrderItem.order_id = w2_Order.order_id ) INNER JOIN w2_OrderOwner ON ( w2_OrderOwner.order_id = w2_Order.order_id ) INNER JOIN w2_OrderShipping ON ( w2_OrderShipping.order_id = w2_Order.order_id ) WHERE @@ order_id_where @@

UpdateAmazonShipNoteProgress.Statement: UPDATE w2_Order SET mall_link_status = 'SHIPNOTE_PROGRESS' WHERE @@ order_id_where @@

UpdateAmazonShipNoteComplete.Statement: UPDATE w2_Order SET mall_link_status = 'SHIPNOTE_COMP' WHERE @@ order_id_where @@
